message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12500. This is a great deal, and I'm sure you won't find a better price anywhere else.
Thank you for offering me the product, Alice. I appreciate your enthusiasm for it. I believe $10000 would be a fair price for me to consider purchasing this product.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was really hoping to get a bit more for it. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $11750. This is a great compromise, and I think it's still a fantastic deal for you.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $9500.

I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to make one more concession and offer it to you for $11000. This is the lowest price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you.
Thank you for your continued willingness to negotiate, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to propose a final price of $9800 for the product.

I understand that you're trying to stay within your budget, Bob, but I'm really not comfortable going any lower than $10500. This is the minimum price I'm willing to accept, and I think it's still a great deal for you. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer it to you for $10500. This is my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, Alice. Considering my needs and the value I place on the product, I would like to propose a price of $10200.
I'm not willing to go any higher than my previous offer, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway again and offer it to you for $10250. This is my final offer, and I'm not willing to negotiate further.
Thank you for your last offer, Alice. Considering my budget and the value I see in the product, I would like to propose a final price of $10000.
